title: How Tchaikovsky's 'Nutcracker' Became A Holiday Tradition
teaser: Renee Montagne talks with Miles Hoffman about the history of Tchaikovsky's The Nutcracker Suite. Hoffman is the violist of the American Chamber Players, and authored The NPR Classical Music Companion.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
